H0.text: What is the English name of the city of Firenze. Florence

H1.text: What is the English name of the city of Firenze. Firenza

H2.text: What is the English name of the city of Firenze. Florentia

H3.text: What is the English name of the city of Firenze. פירנצה

A4.text: Florence is the capital city of the Italian region of Tuscany.

A5.text: Florence's Latin name was Florentia, meaning 'the Flourishing Town', from Latin: florēre, lit.
